cast.name: 汉克·阿扎利亚 Hank Azaria
蕾娜·哈迪斯蒂 Reina Hardesty
保罗·F·汤普金斯 Paul F. Tompkins

awards:
第11届美国评论家选择电视奖(2021)
　　喜剧类最佳男主角(提名) 汉克·阿扎利亚

director.name: 莫里斯·马拉布尔 Maurice Marable

trans_title: 金牌评论员 第四季
introduction: It’s 15 years into the dystopian future and Jim Brockmire (Hank Azaria) is now the Commissioner of baseball. After his wife’s infidelities decades ago triggered a public meltdown and sent him on a drug-fueled tear across the globe, the once legendary baseball announcer is now back on top and his struggles with sobriety are behind him. However, at this later stage of his life he is tasked with saving America’s pastime as the world around him descends into chaos, all while trying to salvage his relationship with his newfound daughter (Reina Hardesty) and rekindle the love he once had for Jules (Amanda Peet).
chinese_title: 金牌评论员 第四季
